title: Portfolio
description: A collection of creative assets that can hold source assets (images, videos, copy), assembled creatives, or both. Contains brand context and trackers. Creatives can be generated on-demand for specific formats. Gives buyers full visibility and portability across seller agents.

brand_manifest_url.description: URL to the live brand manifest. Creative agent fetches current version when generating creatives.

generation_prompt.description: Default prompt/direction for creative generation. Used by build_creatives task when no prompt override is provided. Enables lazy building of formats requested by sellers via format-request webhook.

allow_format_requests.description: Whether seller agents can request new formats to be built from this portfolio's assets

allow_adaptation_requests.description: Whether seller agents can request adaptations of existing creatives (CTA changes, localization, etc.)

governance_agent.description: Optional governance agent that reviews creatives before approval. All creatives must pass governance review before being marked as approved.

assets.description: Source assets available for building creatives (images, videos, copy, etc.)

asset_id.description: Identifier for this asset within the portfolio

asset_type.description: Type of asset (image, video, text, etc.)

trackers.description: Tracker URL templates with macro placeholders. Baked into ad tags at build time, macros expanded by seller at serve time.

archived.description: Whether this portfolio is archived. Cannot archive if connected to an active media buy.

updated_at.description: When this portfolio was last modified
